content:
The head of the UK Defense Ministry Grant Shappa said that Vladimir Putin would not be able to steal Ukraine.

About this Grant ShappsPosted March 18on social media X.

“Putin stole another election, but he will not steal Ukraine. The United Kingdom will work with its allies to stop this thief, increasing our collective support for Ukraine, ”said Shapps Grant.

He recalled that, as history shows, it is necessary to stop dictators and autocrats, otherwise they will continue to steal even more.

It should be reminded that the so -called elections were held in the Russian Federation, the victory of which was attributed to Vladimir Putin. BeforeArmyInform reportedthat more than 50 UN countries have condemned Russian pseudo -elections in the temporarily occupied territories of Ukraine.
title: The UK's Defense Minister called Putin a thief
description: Grant Shapps wrote about this on March 18 on social network X.    "Putin stole another 'election',...
author: Army Inform
